alert.note: Alert for Beadle (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 09 at 9:34AM MDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Dakota... James River at Huron affecting Beadle County. James River near Forestburg affecting Sanborn County. For the James River...including Huron, Forestburg, Mitchell...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...James River at Huron. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, significant amounts of rural areas will experience flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Monday the stage was 11.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 AM CDT Monday was 11.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 12.0 feet early Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 PM CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu James River Huron 11.0 11.0 Mon 9 AM CDT 11.5 12.0 11.8 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Tuesday afternoon at 1230 PM CDT.
